name: Crabsylvania (Working Title)
description: Crabsylvania (Working Title) is a game (or at least part of one) created in three weeks for CRABJAM 2020. Explore the depths of the Baltimore Crabs' home stadium, the Crabitat, and experience a loose retelling of their journey throughout Blaseball all the way to their ascension. Unfortunately, this gamejam build only contains the first area out of about 3 and a half. Stay tuned for updates as we try to finish it.
